A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
As a Star Wars fan I was sure I would not just like\, but love this movie. So I was surprised to find myself shaking my head and groaning whilst watching this movie.

The visuals are on par with what I expected\, but the writing is just poor. At one point the main villain says he wants to kill the past\, and that seems to be director Rian Johnsons vision too. If you share the same vision as the bad guy in real life\, that usually don't lead to good things\, as evidenced by this movie.

He killed everything I love about Star Wars\, and in this reviewers eyes\, he's the bad guy.
